data.text: @RIHEALTH This is misinformation. You can’t make this claim about the c19 jabs when no long term studies have been completed. You’re all liars and cons.

@RIHEALTH There isnt evidence cause there werent 5-10 year long term clinical trials executed by the companies!  This is the reason why we do long term studies so your statement is negligent & dangerous

@RIHEALTH "FACT: There is no evidence that any vaccines, including COVID-19 vaccines, cause fertility problems in women or men."  SHAME on @RIHEALTH for posting this nonsense! How can you say this definitively when there is NO LONG TERM SAFETY DATA for this procedure? Please delete this!
@RIHEALTH There’s also no longitudinal studies that it doesn’t... You people are unbelievable. This one won’t age well and I will be sure to screen shot and save for decades. 👌🏼
@RIHEALTH Little too soon to tell , no?
@RIHEALTH And there is no evidence that they don’t!!!!
